text:
Hi all,
I would like to code a custom menu in HTML & JS but using the tool of the "Advanced Menus" of HubSpot for creating the structure.
Is it possible to get an Array in Hubl with all the information of the advanced menus? For example "Label, URL, Parent" ..

Unfortunately not, the Advanced Menus tool is best customizable via CSS, there's no server-side solution for customizing the HTML markup. If the menus tool isn't paramount, the best way to achieve what you're describing is by using HubDB.
<@UBKP9GNBH> you can do what you are looking for with simple menu, but not the main menu.

Thanks Chad, I'm looking to this guide
<https://growth.org/discuss/using-export-to-template-context-true-with-hubl-simple-menu-module>
